data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word عَذَابٌ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: To drive away, repel, turn off, discard, banish.
data.sentence: The word دُحُورًا comes from the root د ح ر and is associated with the meanings: To drive away, repel, turn off, discard, banish.

data.meanings: to be perpetual, incumbent, be firm, last, continue.
data.sentence: The word وَاصِبٌ comes from the root و ص ب and is associated with the meanings: to be perpetual, incumbent, be firm, last, continue.
